channel.title: About on Shanyan Guan (官善琰)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Shanyan Guan (官善琰)

item.title: About
item.description: About Me My name is Shanyan Guan. I am a direct doctorate student at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, supervised by Prof. Xiaokang Yang. Currently (2019-), I am engaged in inverse graphics and domain generalization with Prof. Yunbo Wang. From 2017 to 2019, I worked with Prof. Bingbing Ni. I received my B.S. in Electronic and Information Engineering at Xidian University in 2017. My research focuses on human mesh reconstruction and related applications, such as animation.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: shyanguan@sjtu.edu.cn Wechat: Guan-Shyan Mailing Address Software Building, Shanghai Jiao Tong Unicersity 800 Dongchuan Road Minhang District Shanghai China
